title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any Ollama model in two lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python lib.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering LLM, chat, embed and tool-calling components backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama—multi-model convos, PDF uploads, RAG, user auth, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight CLI coding assistant powered by Ollama; inline refactor, explain, unit-test generation.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF-QA bots, voice chat, function-calling, fine-tune, Docker-compose stacks.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-compose
summary: One-command Docker-Compose stack adding OpenAI-compatible gateway, WebUI, and Nginx to Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping, Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; chat, generate, pull, list with idiomatic Ruby blocks.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing async/tokio client for Ollama; strong typing and streaming iterator.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models; slash commands, thread support.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt bot that streams Ollama answers into threads; per-channel model selection, rate limiting.

title: ollama-grafana
summary: Prometheus exporter + Grafana dashboard for GPU/CPU usage, tokens/sec, model stats of Ollama server.

title: ollama-chat-angular
summary: Minimal Angular chat app that streams responses from Ollama; standalone component, SSR ready.

title: ollama.nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to prompt Ollama inside buffers; selection refactor, inline explain, customizable prompts.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension adding Ollama chat sidebar and code actions; supports custom Modelfile configs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-huggingface-hub
summary: Hugging Face Space template to run Ollama in a container with Gradio UI; one-click deploy to HF.
